JobTitle: Manager, Launch Management - Risk and Payment Operations
JobFullDesc: Our Risk and Payments team’s purpose is to serve our global community by providing customer support for payment issues, and protecting individuals and businesses against payment abuse. We seek to lead the payments industry in trust, integrity, and support. To help us achieve this mission, we are hiring a Lead in our Launch Management team. In this role, you'll be primarily responsible for managing a team of Program Managers while program managing some of the new product and strategic initiatives yourself. The Launch Management team makes sure that our Risk and Payment Operations organization is ready to support new payment products and initiatives developed at Facebook. This requires coordinating and driving requirements across our internal stakeholder teams in Risk and Payments, as well as influencing product teams to incorporate fraud management and customer support best practices.
